item.title: So many pot holes at this junction and all the way up to Lilley Brook GC. Dangerous to drivers and cyclists have to deviate from moving in straight lines to avoid the shoddy surface, 23rd March
item.description:
From Croft Road junction up to Lilley Brook GC

Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Traffic light sequence causing gridlock near Top Shop, 23rd March
item.description:
The traffic lights sequencing near Top Shop, Churchdown Lane, Hucclecote Road has been set incorrectly since the road works. This is leading to grid lock with traffic heading from Hucclecote to Brockworth backed up past Green Lane to the Wagon and Horses. It has made crossing the road for pedestrians unsafe as they have to weave through the cars. Also hampers cars exiting/accessing driveways.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hucclecote Road, Hucclecote, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Green or amber traffic light is not working

item.title: Sent to Gloucestershire County Council less than a minute later. FixMyStreet ref: 5719747. Photo of this report At the Junction between Guinevere Road and Tennyson Road close to Nº 39 Tennyson - this has been reported as being’fixed’ and clearly only a holding action has been taken leaving sharp metal that if fallen against would cause potential injury. Please revisit and complete the remediation. Thank you, 22nd March
item.description:
Sent to Gloucestershire County Council less than a minute later. FixMyStreet ref: 5719747. Photo of this report At the Junction between Guinevere Road and Tennyson Road close to Nº 39 Tennyson - this has not been fixed and exposed sharp metal has been left which if fallen onto has potential for injury. Please return to fully remediate the communal fencing.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 2, Guinevere Road, St Mark's, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
